grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 壊滅【カイメツ】destruction, annihilation, devastation, catastrophe
壊血病【カイケツビョウ】scurvy
壊劫【エコウ】the kalpa of destruction (the third aeon of the universe)
金剛不壊【コンゴウフエ】firm and solid, sturdy and indestructible, unshakable, adamantine
kun reading compounds: 壊す【こわす】to break, to destroy, to demolish, to wreck, to ruin, to spoil, to damage, to break (a bill, etc.)
壊れる【こわれる】to be broken, to break, to fall through, to come to nothing
